name: Cooking Town - Restaurant Game
description:
Cook, decorate your restaurant and serve your customers the best dishes! Start a highly addictive time management game in which you can build your restaurant, decorate the buildings of the block, and make it a cooking paradise, with a more refreshing operating experience!

Welcome to Cooking Town, and your grandma and friends are in urgent need of help - the family restaurant, and this once bustling gourmet town, is disappearing because of excessive real-estate development.

Features:
● Rebuild various themed restaurants and shops such as burger restaurants, pet shops, dessert carts, and coffee houses.

● Cook hundreds of cuisines of characteristics throughout the world.

● In-game boosters such as overcook protector, cook accelerator and auto dish distributor will make you a great chef! Join the game to discover more possibilities!

● Decorate the whole block and all its buildings on your own preferences to make Cooking Town shine again!

● Join a variety of cooking activities, take part in gourment travel on hot air balloons, and record a masterchef TV show!

● Fill your villa and garden with the trophies and medals you won in cooking contests!

● Adopt cute pets, make more friends, and enjoy your time in Cooking Town!

● Interact with town residents and learn about the stories of Cooking Town!

More Gameplay:

1. All you have to do is to slide the screen - it provides better experience on time management.

2. Party Time mode - get more combo hits to pass levels faster! See what you can do!

3. Mean Customers mode - meaner customers with more demands... What will you do?

Come to Cooking Town and leave a wonderful mark in its history!
